mapper.insert: INSERT INTO psp_order (oid, orderNo, sid, sellerJson, uid, label, content, pid, status, stage, createTime, isAllot, updateTime) VALUES (#{oid}, #{orderNo}, #{sid}, #{sellerJson}, #{uid}, #{label}, #{content}, #{pid}, #{status}, #{stage}, now(), #{isAllot}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT o.*,p.pid as ppid,p.name as pname, p.phoneNum as pphoneNum, p.contact as ppcontact, c.cid as ccid,c.oid as coid, c.name as cname, c.contractNo, c.partyA, c.partyB, c.contractUrl, c.signTime, c.startTime, c.endTime, c.createTime, c.service, c.money, c.payment, c.paymentWay, c.paymentDesc, f.fid, f.content as fcontent, f.averageScore FROM psp_order o left join psp_provider p on o.pid = p.pid left join psp_order_contract c on o.oid = c.oid left join psp_order_feedback f on o.oid = f.oid where o.oid = #{oid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO psp_order_contract (oid, name, contractNo, partyA, partyB, contractUrl, signTime, startTime, endTime, createTime, service, money, payment, paymentWay, paymentDesc) VALUES (#{oid}, #{name}, #{contractNo}, #{partyA}, #{partyB}, #{contractUrl}, #{signTime}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, now(), #{service}, #{money}, #{payment}, #{paymentWay}, #{paymentDesc});
INSERT INTO psp_order_feedback (oid, sid, pid, content, averageScore, serviceScore, createTime) VALUES (#{oid}, #{sid}, #{pid}, #{content}, #{averageScore}, #{serviceScore}, now());
